languages.text: "Скоро астрокартографам придется потрудиться, чтобы вымарать со звездных карт название "Владения Винтерскейлов". Кара бесчестия, что ляжет на их династию, будет достойным наказанием за грехи Каллигоса".

"Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."
languages.original_text: "Скоро астрокартографам придется потрудиться, чтобы вымарать со звездных карт название "Владения Винтерскейлов". Кара бесчестия, что ляжет на их династию, будет достойным наказанием за грехи Каллигоса".

traits.locale_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name Winterscale's Realm from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “用不了多久，温特斯凯尔的王国就会在星图上消失了。他的王朝将会分崩离析，他犯下了这样的重罪，这是他应得的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."

traits.locale_text: “用不了多久，温特斯凯尔的王国就会在星图上消失了。他的王朝将会分崩离析，他犯下了这样的重罪，这是他应得的惩罚。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「天体写真家はその内、ウィンタースケールの領域の文字を天体図から消すことで、忙しくなるだろう。この王朝に降りかかる不名誉は、カリゴスの罪への罰としては、相応しいだろう」
languages.original_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."

traits.locale_text: 「天体写真家はその内、ウィンタースケールの領域の文字を天体図から消すことで、忙しくなるだろう。この王朝に降りかかる不名誉は、カリゴスの罪への罰としては、相応しいだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Los astrocartógrafos tendrán pronto mucho trabajo borrando de los mapas el nombre del reino de Winterscale. La deshonra que caerá sobre la dinastía será el castigo perfecto para los crímenes de Calligos».
languages.original_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."

traits.locale_text: «Los astrocartógrafos tendrán pronto mucho trabajo borrando de los mapas el nombre del reino de Winterscale. La deshonra que caerá sobre la dinastía será el castigo perfecto para los crímenes de Calligos».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Die Astrokartografen werden bald alle Hände voll zu tun haben, denn sie müssen den Namen von Winterzunders Reich aus den Sternenkarten tilgen. Die gewaltige Schande, die über die Dynastie kommen wird, ist eine gerecht Strafe für Calligos' Verbrechen."
languages.original_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."

traits.locale_text: "Die Astrokartografen werden bald alle Hände voll zu tun haben, denn sie müssen den Namen von Winterzunders Reich aus den Sternenkarten tilgen. Die gewaltige Schande, die über die Dynastie kommen wird, ist eine gerecht Strafe für Calligos' Verbrechen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Les astrocartographes se chargeront bientôt d'effacer totalement le nom de Winterscale sur les cartes stellaires. Le déshonneur qui s'abattra sur cette dynastie sera un châtiment à la hauteur des crimes de Calligos. »
languages.original_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."

traits.locale_text: « Les astrocartographes se chargeront bientôt d'effacer totalement le nom de Winterscale sur les cartes stellaires. Le déshonneur qui s'abattra sur cette dynastie sera un châtiment à la hauteur des crimes de Calligos. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Astrokartograflarımız çok yakında 'Winterscale Diyarı'nı yıldız haritalarından silmeye başlayacak. Hanedanlığa kesilecek onur kırıcı cezalar, Calligos'un suçlarına uygun bir karşılık olacak."
languages.original_text: "Astrocartographers will soon have their hands full erasing the name 'Winterscale's Realm' from star maps. The castigating disgrace that will fall upon the dynasty will be a fitting punishment for Calligos's crimes."

traits.locale_text: "Astrokartograflarımız çok yakında 'Winterscale Diyarı'nı yıldız haritalarından silmek işine girişecek. Hanedanlığın üzerine çökecek olan onur kırıcı cezalandırmalar, Calligos'un suçlarına uygun bir karşılık olacak."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
